metadata.synopsis: The Colony Butcher, Chop, reacts to interacting with a mind flayer manuscript.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe COL_Butcher"- Recruit Chop, the Colony butcher, by performing a successful ILLITHID roll- Find and read an illithid manuscript while controlling Chop, e.g. S_COL_MemLib_Manuscript_001_3da0434f-f7d1-45d9-a684-3cfec4b114f0 at "goto 683.65 -42 -5.3"
